name: G. Willi-Food International Ltd.
description: G. Willi-Food International Ltd. is a leading Israeli food import and distribution company. Founded in 1990, the company specializes in offering a wide range of quality food products, including dairy, frozen foods, dry goods, and delicacies sourced from various international suppliers. With a strong commitment to quality and customer satisfaction, G. Willi-Food has built a reputation for excellence in the food industry, catering to both retail and wholesale markets. The company operates through a well-established logistics network, ensuring timely delivery and efficient distribution to its extensive customer base. G. Willi-Food is dedicated to innovation and regularly expands its product offerings to meet changing consumer preferences. The company focuses on healthy and organic options, aligning with global trends toward healthier eating. With a strong presence in the Israeli market and expanding international operations, G. Willi-Food aims to enhance its footprint in the global food industry while maintaining its commitment to quality and sustainability.

seo.meta_title: G. Willi-Food International Ltd. | Leading Food Importer & Distributor
seo.meta_description: Explore G. Willi-Food International Ltd., a leading Israeli food distributor specializing in high-quality dairy, frozen foods, and dry goods. Discover our commitment to quality and sustainability.

faq.question: What does G. Willi-Food specialize in?
faq.answer: G. Willi-Food specializes in importing and distributing a wide range of food products, including dairy, frozen foods, and dry goods.

faq.question: Who is the CEO of G. Willi-Food?
faq.answer: Zvi Williger is the CEO of G. Willi-Food International Ltd.

faq.question: Where is G. Willi-Food headquartered?
faq.answer: G. Willi-Food is headquartered in Bnei Brak, Israel.

faq.question: What types of products does G. Willi-Food offer?
faq.answer: G. Willi-Food offers dairy products, frozen foods, and dry goods, among other food items.
